name: DegenerativeNeurologicalDisorder
title: Degenerative Neurological Disorder
description: ICD10 codes listed are from PSI 11 Degenerative neurological disorder diagnosis codes: (DGNEUID)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for degenerative neurological disorders),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis or Condition),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent degenerative neurological disorders),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
